features.featureTitle: Build a multi-page React frontend with the following pages: Home, Products, Quality Assurance, Global Footprint, and Contact/Inquiry. Implement a client-side router (React Router) with a persistent top navigation bar containing the AZAD NEXUS logo/wordmark, nav links to all pages, and a prominent 'Request a Quote' CTA button.

Design the entire site with a premium, minimalist corporate aesthetic. Color palette: Deep Royal Blue (#0A1F5C or similar) as the primary brand color, Gold/Warm Amber (#C9A84C or similar) as the accent, and abundant white space with off-white backgrounds. Typography should be clean and professional (e.g., a serif display font for headlines, sans-serif for body). Apply this theme consistently across all pages and components.

Build the Home page with the following sections in order: (1) Full-width hero section featuring the hero image (hero-split.dim_1920x1080.png) as background with the headline 'Connecting India's Finest Harvest to the World' and subheadline 'Premium Basmati & Non-Basmati Rice — Sourced Direct, Delivered Global', plus dual CTAs: 'Request a Quote' and 'Explore Products'; (2) Brief About Us summary (3–4 sentences about AZAD NEXUS as a trusted Indian rice exporter); (3) Featured Products horizontal slider showcasing 3–4 key rice varieties with name, one-line description, and a 'View Details' link; (4) 'Why Choose Us' section with three cards: Timely Delivery, Competitive Pricing, Direct Sourcing — each with an icon and short description; (5) 'Direct from Farmers' section with a short paragraph and a warm illustrative accent emphasizing farm-to-export authenticity.

Build the Products page with two categories: Category A — Premium Basmati (varieties: 1121, Pusa, Steam) and Category B — Non-Basmati (varieties: Long Grain, IR64, Parboiled). Each product card must display: product name, a short description, and a specs table with Grain Length (mm), Moisture Content (%), and Purity (%). Include a tab or section toggle to switch between the two categories.

Build the Quality Assurance page with three sections: (1) Certifications — display placeholder badge cards for APEDA Registration and ISO Certification, each with a logo placeholder slot and a note that actual credentials will be updated; (2) Lab Testing — describe the testing process (moisture, purity, grain sizing) in a visually structured layout (e.g., numbered steps or icon list); (3) Packaging Standards — describe export-grade packaging with moisture-control bags and labeling compliance.

Build the Global Footprint section as a dedicated page section (or standalone page). Use a card/grid layout to highlight the following export markets: Middle East, Europe, Southeast Asia, and Africa. Each card should show the region name, a representative icon or flag cluster, and one line describing the trade relationship or key buyer type.

Build the Contact/Inquiry page with a lead-generation form containing the following fields: Full Name (text), Company Name (text), Country (text or select), Rice Variety (select: 1121 Basmati, Pusa Basmati, Steam Basmati, Long Grain, IR64, Parboiled), Quantity in MT (number), and an optional Message field. The form CTA button should read 'Request a Quote'. On submission, call the backend to store the inquiry. Show a success confirmation message upon successful submission.

Build a password-protected Admin Panel page (route: /admin). It should show a password input form initially. On correct password entry, fetch and display all submitted inquiries in a sortable table with columns: ID, Name, Company, Country, Rice Variety, Quantity (MT), Message, and Timestamp. The admin password should match what is hardcoded in the backend. Include a 'Logout' button that clears the session and returns to the password screen.

Add SEO-relevant meta tags to the HTML head (index.html): page title 'AZAD NEXUS — Premium Basmati Rice Exporter from India', meta description containing keywords 'Premium Basmati Rice Exporter, Indian Rice Supplier, Bulk Rice Export', and Open Graph tags for title, description, and image.

Render the generated hero split image (hero-split.dim_1920x1080.png) as the full-width hero background on the Home page. Render the rice grain texture image (rice-texture.dim_1200x800.png) as a decorative section background or product catalog accent. Render the AZAD NEXUS logo (azad-nexus-logo.dim_400x120.png) in the navigation bar and footer. All images must be served from frontend/public/assets/generated/.
